Interface IWeightsToDistancesConverter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMultilingual
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LSAAlgorithm

    public interface IWeightsToDistancesConverter
extends IMultilingual
    This interface defines a set of methods to be used for data preparation.

    Its name is not really correct and I do not remember why exactly this name was chosen initially

    Author:
    Pdz
